cause.description:
Angel Babies...Gone too soon was created to help parents grieve the loss of their child. We hope that you will find comfort and support here and that you will continue to visit.
Our Founder Angel Babies...Gone too Soon was founded by a mothers whose precious baby girl was born still. This support group was created in the memory of Caitlin Madison Magee, born into heaven on January 28th, 2003.
Marianne Magee
Marianne and her husband Dave were delighted to learn that they had become pregnant on their honeymoon. Marianne's pregnancy was uneventful and extremely joyful. They anxiously awaited the arrival of their daughter and the day finally came, January 28th, 2003. Due to a cord accident during labour, their precious little girl was born still.
The graphics found on this site are the sole property of Angel Babies...Gone too soon and cannot be copied or reproduced unless written permission has been provided by Marianne Magee.
1. Ensuring that no parent grieves alone.
2. Providing compassionate and caring support to grieving parents.
